GSD.description:
scsi: pm8001: Fix use-after-free for aborted TMF sas_task

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit 510b21442c3a2e3ecc071ba3e666b320e7acdd61. For more details please see the references link.
